title: Drawing, "Jascha Heifetz Apartment: Wall Elevation", ca. 1935
medium: Graphite and black ink on white wove paper
markings: Office letterhead rinted in black ink on verso: MEMORANDUM FROM/DONALD DESKY/501 MADISON AVE/NEW YORK/TELEPHONE/EL.5-0481. Graphite mark at center.
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at left margin: H of Room/9'1/4"; at upper right: 7-5400; at upper margin: 8 1/2"/ 18 5/8.
description: Wall elevation for Jascha Heifetz apartment, New York City. Probably for game room/bar. Elevation shows wide arched entrance on left side of wall, more narrow arched entrance on right side of wall. Window on far right side of wall (?).

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Jascha Heifetz Apartment: Wall Elevation", ca. 1935.
ca. 1935. Graphite and black ink on white wove paper. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-236-3.
